name: Desktopaint
tagline: Project to show beautiful images from feature lists
body:
Desktopaint

Bring beautiful art to your macOS desktop üñåÔ∏è. Wallpaper ‚Ä¢ Features ‚Ä¢ Downloads ‚Ä¢ Technologies ‚Ä¢ 3rd Party Libraries ‚Ä¢ Development ‚Ä¢ FAQ ‚Ä¢ ## Wallpaper
Red Vineyard At Arles
The Starry Night
The Wanderer Above The Sea of Fog
## Features * üíª Generate beautiful wallpaper depend on your screen size. * üåé Choose favorite category or list of wallpapers (coming soon) * üëë Automatically fetch feature art every day. * ‚ù§Ô∏è Open-source project. * üíØ Totally Free. ## Downloads All downloads are available at [Release page](https://github.com/topre-dev/desktopaint-macos/releases) ### macOS Requirement The minimum version supported is macOS 10.13. ## Technologies * [Swift 4.1](https://swift.org) * [macOS Native](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/) * [RxSwift](https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxSwift) * [MVVM](https://www.objc.io/issues/13-architecture/mvvm/) ## 3rd Party Libraries * [Moya/RxSwift](https://github.com/Moya/Moya) * [RxSwift](https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxSwift) * [RxCocoa](https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxSwift/tree/master/RxCocoa) * [RxOptional](https://github.com/RxSwiftCommunity/RxOptional) * [Action](https://github.com/RxSwiftCommunity/Action) * [Alamofire](https://github.com/Alamofire/Alamofire) * [Unbox](https://github.com/JohnSundell/Unbox) * [RxNuke](https://github.com/kean/RxNuke) * [Sparkle](https://sparkle-project.org) ## Originally cloned from [Artify](https://github.com/NghiaTranUIT/artify-macos) ## Development * Clone this project * Run `$ pod install` * Open `DesktopaintWorkspace.xcworkspace` * Happy coding üë®‚Äçüíª ## FAQ * **What is the original project?** > Check out [Artify](https://github.com/NghiaTranUIT/artify-macos) for original 18th century based wallpapers only. * **Can I become a contributor?** > Get in touch with us at desktopaint@topre.dev or feel free to open an issue on Github * **Do you have personal blog?** > You can check out [Adam's](https://adam.kostarelas.com/blog) blog.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
